title: #87: The Keepers Suspects
description:
The RCP team of Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti arc Episode 5 of The Keepers. They discuss Lil's need to confront Maskell, the journey from victimhood to survivor and analyze the possible suspects introduced in the documentary.


#HerNameWasCathy

#HerNameWasJoyce

#HerNameISJean

#HerNaamesISTeresa

#HerNameISLil
